item.title: Trump plans Putin summit on Ukraine, raising stakes for Zelensky meeting

item.title: GOP tries to brand anti-Trump ‘No Kings’ protests as ‘hate America’ rallies
item.description: Ahead of the more than 2,600 rallies planned for Saturday across the country, Republican officials have sought to cast the protests against the presid...

item.title: Government shutdown showcases Mike Johnson’s increasingly bold style
item.description: Johnson, nearly two years into his speakership, is taking a hard line in shutdown negotiations.

item.title: Trump’s focus on looks — from ‘central casting’ to ‘those lips’
item.description: The president’s longtime interest in physical appearance was frequently in evidence this week, including on his swing through the Middle East.

item.title: Top military officer central to Trump’s drug war will step down early
item.description: Adm. Alvin Holsey has served as the head of U.S. Southern Command for less than a year. The position typically rotates every three years.
